statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

article.headline: San Francisco 50, Montana 48
article.story: SAN FRANCISCO -- Michael Williams set career highs with 23 points and 13 rebounds to lead San Francisco past Montana 50-48 in overtime Sunday. It was the first collegiate double-double for Williams, a sophomore guard who scored USF's first 11 points of the second half. Perris Blackwell also had a double-double with 12 points and 10 rebounds for the Dons (4-5). Blackwell scored USF's only basket in overtime, a putback at the 1:54 mark that gave the Dons the lead for good. Derek Selvig matched his career high with 18 points for Montana (5-4), which lost for only the second time in its last seven games. Will Cherry had 13 points for the Grizzlies.
